category_profile.name: 영약 (Elixirs / Spiritual Medicines)
category_profile.definition: Rare substances formed by nature over centuries or refined by alchemy. Consuming them boosts Internal Energy (Nae-gong), heals incurable diseases, or alters body constitution.
category_profile.role_in_story: The classic 'MacGuffin' or 'Level Up' item found in hidden caves or guarded by beasts.

sect_signature_pills.description: Man-made elixirs refined by major sects using secret recipes (Yeon-dan-sul).

list.name: 대환단 (大還丹)
list.effect: The most famous elixir. Revives the dying and boosts Qi significantly. Lower tier: Sohwandan (小還丹).

list.name: 태청단 (太淸丹)
list.effect: Purifies internal energy and aids in Taoist cultivation.

list.name: 자하신단 (紫霞神丹)
list.effect: Specifically boosts the Violet Mist Divine Art.

list.name: 취구환 (翠救丸)
list.effect: Often used as an antidote for poisons.

legendary_natural_treasures.description: Formed by nature over thousands of years. Far more potent (and dangerous) than man-made pills.

list.name: 공청석유 (空淸石乳)
list.properties: Pure energy. Safe for commoners (extends life) and masters (massive Qi boost). Can provide infinite potential.

list.name: 만년하수오 (萬年何首烏)
list.properties: Balanced Qi. Increases longevity and internal energy.
list.risk: Moderate. Safer than Ginseng but still potent.

list.name: 주과 (朱果)
list.properties: Boosts Yang energy. Famous for preserving youth/beauty (Anti-aging) and longevity.

list.name: 만년설삼 (萬年雪蔘)
list.effect: Massive Yin Qi. Good for Ice Arts.
list.risk: Extreme. Will freeze a normal person to death instantly. Needs preparation.

list.name: 만년지극혈보 (萬年至極血寶)
list.effect: Cures 'Nine Yin Severed Meridians' (Gu-eum Jeol-maek). Massive Yang Qi.
list.risk: Extreme. Will melt organs and meridians if consumed without preparation.

narrative_usage: Falling off a cliff -> Finding a skeleton and 'Gongcheong-seokyu' -> Becoming a master.
Heroine has 'Cold Disease' (Yin) -> Hero quests for 'Fire Fruit' (Yang) to save her.
Eating a 'Legendary Elixir' raw -> Suffering from energy overload -> Meditating to absorb it.
